explanation: BTC sentiment is highly mixed but the positive momentum outweighs the bearishness in the short-term. Many users mention holding, buying, and expecting price increases (targets of 98k, 105k, 108k, 109k, 120k, and even 600k), and some use technical indicators (trendlines, support, EMA, engulfing, etc.) as reasons for bullishness. There is visible debate, but the number of positive and neutral opinions, and multiple confirmations of uptrend and support holding, support a buy signal. Additionally, several users mention buying on dips, holding for higher targets, and expecting a bounce back after dips. Short-term candlestick and trendline analysis from community members also suggest upside continuation, and news like GameStop allocating reserves to BTC adds further confidence.
